project_descr: PPG "Production of Sustainable Renewable Biomass-based Charcoal"

outputs.output_descr: BRA/12/G41 is a Project Preparation Grant ( PPG) for the formulation of  the "Production of Sustainable Renewable Biomass-based Charcoal for the Iron and Steel Industry in Brazil" full project. The project shall: (i) collect and process necessary technical information and other inputs to details the design of the above-mentioned Full-Sized project; and (ii) establish a joint sector agenda with stakeholders.
